configdir.name: Config Dir: Create your own Platformer button texture presets here!
configdir.description:
<cy>(Hopefully.)</c>
This setting does literally nothing new except being a button that acts as a shortcut to open the config directory for this mod (which is kind of important for making the button texture setup process less tedious, because this is where you will store platformer button texture presets), because the legendary developers in the Geode Team themselves forgot to add a shortcut button that would have done this exact same thing, and I have gotten far too many folks (rightfully) asking me to find the config directory when using some of my other mods, and I hate repeating the same things over and over again, and I don't know if the next major update for Geode will also repeat this mistake where HJfod forgets to include a config directory shortcut button, so this setting and this button are here for extra insurance, so please enjoy this extra button, I guess. Anyway, by the time you're finished reading this, your device should be finished with opening the config directory; press "Aight" to close this window.

jumpMainTextureP1.name: P1 Jump Main Texture
jumpMainTextureP1.description:
Choose a PNG file for the P1 jump button texture.
# <c-ff0000>***__ONLY PNG FILES ARE ALLOWED.__***</c>

disableTintingP1Jump.name: Disable P1 Jump Button Tinting When Pressed

textureP1JumpWhenPressed.name: Apply Custom Texture When P1 Jump Pressed
textureP1JumpWhenPressed.description: If this is disabled, the button will simply be tinted.

jumpPressedTextureP1.name: P1 Jump Pressed Texture
jumpPressedTextureP1.description:
Choose a PNG file for the P1 jump button texture when it is pressed.
# <c-ff0000>***__ONLY PNG FILES ARE ALLOWED.__***</c>
